exchangeLuckyballComment: Ị gbapụtala akara gị maka bọọlụ Lucky.
inviteLuckyballComment: Ị nwetala bọọlụ kechioma maka ịkpọ enyi gị.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: Ị gbapụtala isi ihe maka kaadị onyinye.
purchaseProductByPoint: Ị gbapụtala akara gị maka ngwa ahịa.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: Ị jirila bọọlụ kechioma banye Lucky Draw.
winLotteryPointComment: Enyerela gị akara maka imeri Lotto.
partnerMailContents1: Biko lelee akwụkwọ achọrọ maka nnabata onye mmekọ wee ziga nzaghachi na faịlụ agbakwunyere!
partnerMailContents3:
Biko tinye otu kaadị ID ma ọ bụ paspọtụ gị
iji nyochaa njirimara onye mmekọ gị.
partnerMailContents5:
Biko lelee akwụkwọ na ozi achọrọ
maka nkwado onye mmekọ ma zitere anyị azịza!
partnerMailContents6: (Ụdị azụmahịa, nọmba ụzọ ụzọ, nọmba akaụntụ, aha mbụ onye njide akaụntụ, aha etiti, aha ikpeazụ, akara ekwentị onye nnata, wdg.)
partnerMailContents8:
Biko zitere anyị nọmba ekwentị ebe ị ga-enweta
ka gị na onye òtù ọlụlụ gị kparịta ụka.
partnerMailContents9:
Biko ziga nzaghachi gị site na email na partner@buflexz.com .
Mgbe ndị otu ọrụ nyochachara nzaghachi, a ga-ahazi nyocha na nkwenye ndị mmekọ.
authMailContents1: Anyị ga-ezitere gị nọmba njirimara email.
authMailContents3: Enyerela igodo nyocha maka nyocha email.
authMailContents4:
Biko tinye nọmba nyocha nke ọnụọgụ isii ozugbo n'ime nyocha
mpio n'ime ngwa ma ọ bụ detuo ma mado nọmba nyocha.
authMailContents5:
Email a bụ maka izipu naanị.
Azịza agaghị ekwe omume, yabụ ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ajụjụ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ ihe adịghị mma,
biko kpọtụrụ anyị site na ụlọ ahịa ndị ahịa n'ime ngwa BUFLEXZ.
